stories.text: Since when does Facebook lie about notifications in order to encourage a behavior of downloading messenger, if people don't know about their mobile browser's "view as desktop", allegedly?  I mean, it is a NEW notification indicator after all, not about a message I got a week ago and read then (that wouldn't actually notify me of anything, so the lie would be about it being a notification at all).
stories.title: When I go to Facebook in a browser, it shows 4 messages, but “view as desktop”

stories.text: Folks who build/use distributed databases, what are some good examples of query profiling infra/UI for understanding where time was spent in query execution?
stories.title: Ask HN: Good implementations of query profiles in distributed databases?
